Homer Logistics | New York, NY | https://homerlogistics.com | Full-Time | ONSITE

Help us revolutionize how restaurants deliver food! We're building a centralized delivery system to support the 200,000 food deliveries made each day in NYC. Our software is running in restaurants around the city and is used to coordinate deliveries across our fleet. We're growing incredibly fast, so to help us keep up with demand we're looking to add a few more talented software engineers to our team.

You:

* Write code that is scalable, maintainable and reusable

* Have experience designing, implementing and maintaining APIs as a service for your team and customers

* Have a strong, proven background in Ruby and Ruby on Rails

* Have a working knowledge of practical SQL (preferably PostgreSQL)

* Are comfortable working with JavaScript and AngularJS

* Know when to be practical vs. perfect

We're a small team (15 full-time employees) and an even smaller engineering team (3 full-time employees, including myself), so you will have direct ownership over the projects you work on. You'll also be influential in determining our technology stack going forward.

Email me at robert (at) homerlogistics.com if you're interested in learning more!
